message: Indeed.  Many citizens of the Commonwealth are represented at SciPy this year, and every year.
Presented by Corran Webster of Enthought nee New Zealand!
Mulitaxis example in the examples dir for chaco https://github.com/enthought/chaco/blob/master/examples/demo/multiaxis_using_Plot.py

If you're using the IPython Qt front-end (i.e. start it up with "ipython qtconsole") you can execute scripts like these directly from the web by typing:

%loadpy https://raw.github.com/enthought/chaco/master/examples/demo/multiaxis_using_Plot.py
If I'm not mistaken that will work in console IPython too.
